lst.name: sentence
lst.str: They said West Germany's main objection to the directive in its present form is that it considers as too stringent proposed rules laying down how much information companies issuing non-listed securities should disclose in their prospectuses.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: K. Securities industry has been lobbying hard against an EC Commission proposal, aimed at protecting investors, that would require publication and approval of a prospectus before all public offers of securities.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Eurobonds were not included in the original draft directive, first put forward in 1981, but were brought into its scope later at the request of a number of EC member states.
